title: 17. Roomie Chat: New Product Favorites, Reviews Are Overrated, Your Skin Type, How to Layer Skincare + Level Up Your Professional IG!
description:
Hi Roomies, this is a casual, Q+A based episode! I am covering:

- Why product reviews are overrated

- my tips for social media + a bomb IG page

- how to tell your skin type

- my favorite products at the moment

- order of applying products

You can shop my Glymed store here:

https://glymedplus.io/store/tessaskin

Thank you to today's sponsors:

SNOW teeth whitening for my brightest smile yet!

- Go to trysnow.com and use my code TREATMENT for 15% off your first order. YOU GUYS IM IN LOVEEEEE.

And Gemmist haircare for my customized hair routine!

Right now my listeners can give Gemmist a try and get 20 percent off their shampoo & conditioner subscription! Just visit Gemmist.com to get your personalized recommendation and enter code TREATMENT.

https://gemmist.com/?promo=TREATMENT&utm_source=micropodcast&utm_medium=jaybird&utm_campaign=202102

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:
